100.name: Luck
100.desc:
<FONT color="#D4FF88">5%</FONT> chance to reset cooldown on used skill.
Does not effect Movement Skill, Stand Up Action and Awakening Skills.
Effect triggers only on first skill use. If skill is used again after reset, effect will not trigger.

101.name: Conversion
101.desc:
(Replaces previous bonus)
Damage on Crit <FONT color="#D4FF88">+12%</FONT>.

102.name: Expert
102.desc:
When using any skill, Crit Chance <FONT color="#D4FF88">+1.4%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">10</FONT> seconds.
Stacks <FONT color="#FFFFAC">5</FONT> times.
Stacks decrease when you receive Damage.

103.name: Strong Union
103.desc:
When HP is above <FONT color="#FFFFAC">50%</FONT>, Damage <FONT color="#D4FF88">+4%</FONT> and Damage Taken <FONT color="#D4FF88">-4%</FONT>.
When HP is below <FONT color="#FFFFAC">50%</FONT>, Damage <FONT color="#D4FF88">+3%</FONT> and Damage Taken <FONT color="#D4FF88">-6%</FONT>.

104.name: Blade Shield
104.desc:
On hit, creates a shield that absorbs Damage up to <FONT color="#D4FF88">6%</FONT> of Max HP for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>. (Cooldown <FONT color="#FFFFAC">12s</FONT>.)
While shield is active, Damage <FONT color="#D4FF88">+4%</FONT>.

104.name: Blade Shield
104.desc: While shield is active, Damage <FONT color="#D4FF88">+8%</FONT> instead.

105.name: Vanguard
105.desc:
After using a Movement Skill, gain Charge for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">20s</FONT>. On hit, gain Courage for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">6s</FONT>.
Charge: Damage <FONT color="#D4FF88">+3%</FONT>.
Courage: Attack Power <FONT color="#D4FF88">+3%</FONT>.

105.name: Vanguard
105.desc: When both Charge and Courage are active, Damage <FONT color="#D4FF88">+5%</FONT>.

106.name: Luminary
106.desc:
On skill use, ATK Buff effectiveness <FONT color="#D4FF88">+1.6%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">8s</FONT>.
Stacks <FONT color="#FFFFAC">5</FONT> times.

106.name: Luminary
106.desc: Upon reaching max stacks, ATK Buff effectiveness <FONT color="#D4FF88">+6%</FONT> and Cooldown <FONT color="#D4FF88">-5%</FONT>.

107.name: March
107.desc:
When applying a protection effect, create an Ether. (Cooldown: <FONT color="#FFFFAC">10s</FONT>)
Ether provides Weapon Power <FONT color="#D4FF88">+2230</FONT> to nearby allies. (Duration: <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>)

107.name: March
107.desc: When Ether is created, Movement Speed <FONT color="#D4FF88">+8%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>. ATK Power effectiveness <FONT color="#D4FF88">+6%</FONT>.

108.name: Faith
108.desc:
When using an Awakening Skill, gain Faith for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">3m</FONT>.
Faith: ATK Buff effectiveness <FONT color="#D4FF88">+8%</FONT>.

108.name: Faith
108.desc: Faith: ATK Buff effectiveness <FONT color="#D4FF88">+14%</FONT> and Identity Gain <FONT color="#D4FF88">+5%</FONT>.
